content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking, given its prime location and modern amenities. How much were you thinking of offering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. The apartment does seem to have a lot of potential. As for the rent, I was hoping we could negotiate a price that is fair for both parties. Would you be willing to start at a lower rate, considering the apartment is unfurnished and it's my first time renting in Germany?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Certainly, Yi-Nuo, I'm always open to negotiation. Unfurnished apartments can be a bit of a challenge for tenants, I understand that. How much lower were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I was hoping for a rate of 800 Euros per month. This would help me manage my expenses as a student, and I believe it's a reasonable request considering the state of the housing market in Magdeburg.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 800 Euros per month is quite a bit lower than my initial asking price, Yi-Nuo. However, considering your student status and the current market conditions, I'm willing to accommodate your request. I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm really grateful for your understanding, Mister Schmidt. With this arrangement, I'm confident I can focus on my studies while enjoying a comfortable living space. Thank you for your generosity. I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Yi-Nuo. I'm glad to have reached an agreement that works for both of us. I'm sure you'll find the apartment a perfect place to call home during your studies. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
